wikipedia_page.main: Amanprit "Aman" Kaur Dosanj is an English former footballer who played as a goalkeeper. She is the first British South Asian footballer to represent England at any level.Dosanj went on to be employed by the Football Association as an ambassador. She also worked with the 'Football For All' and 'Kick It Out' campaigns.

response: *Aman Dosanj, footballer, was born in Southampton
*Aman Dosanj – First British Asian footballer to represent England
* Aman Dosanj – first British South Asian footballer to represent England at any level (under-16)
